TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PresentationTraceLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the level of detail to trace about a particular object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks PresentationTraceLevel is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples If you run the application that contains the following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] under a debugger, the output window provides lines of information describing the status and evaluation of the binding:
[!code-xml[Debugging#1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/Debugging.SimpleBinding/Page1.xaml#1)] [!code-xml[Debugging#2](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/Debugging.SimpleBinding/Page1.xaml#2)] [!code-xml[Debugging#3](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/Debugging.SimpleBinding/Page1.xaml#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PresentationTraceLevel High = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PresentationTraceLevel Low = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PresentationTraceLevel Medium = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Traces a medium amount of additional information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PresentationTraceLevel None = int32(0)
